website_summaries.verdict: A fun, fast scooter that's backed by a viable brand.
pros: We love the battery that's quick to charge
Boasts speeds up to 15 miles per hour
High marks for providing a seat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 13 year old son keep in mind he's never ridden a bike and he loved it. It d very easy for him to adapt and even go top speed. This thing is fast! The weight limit is 250 lbs and I tried it out when I needed to go down to the Quik Stop when my husband had the car. I weigh 280 lbs and the scooter hauls, I had to keep it at half speed lol. It charges faster than advertised but we also don't drain the battery completely. It's an awesome toy for teens and adults and I love the seat option, it's definitely a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy item on internet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son as a Christmas gift. Since we live in Ohio didn’t get it out of the box until after the return date, because it’s too cold to ride it. Bought a warranty they won’t cover it not working. Because they say it was defective before. Never buy a scooter online and a warranty unless you plan to get the scooter out in 30-40 days. Paid around 270 for the scooter and warranty. Had to give a 1 star rating but deserves 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: SDHAINES

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the scooter is solid. I am 133 lbs and have no problem getting up small hills (even with packages). The seat is thick and is definitely good for 45 minutes at a time. The speed pickup is very quick. Overall, I was very satisfied with the price I paid. I shopped everywhere on line and Amazon (with Prime Shipping) was the lowest. Received my package in good shape and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Good and fun - battery last 8min at max not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My kids 8 and 10 loved this product. It was easy to put to together, they're having lots of fun with it. Except that the battery last only 8 minutes at best - even when my 8yo son (he is skinny and small) is riding it. I am a bit disappointed in the battery life and would recommend to the seller to post the real power time. No way this is a 40min as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: BDaman

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life is Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I cannot recommend this product. It was great for about 5 months. After that, the batteries would not hold a charge for more than 10 minutes. I could only go a few blocks before having to recharge. I bought brand new batteries (at a cost of almost $100 by the time you add shipping charges) but they only lasted a few weeks until they too would not hold a charge. This scooter only comes with a 90 day warranty, so you are on your own by the time the batteries fail. I am currently looking for a different brand of electric scooter to replace this one. I don't think I will by Razor brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for the heavier persons
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband who needed something fashionable to cruise with us on trips. I purchased this after reading the reviews, especially ones about the weight. Gave to husband for Christmas. He made several attempts to ride this and it would not pull him on level ground. We returned it with no issues. I think it would be a nice item for more youthful riders rather than an alternative to a power chair.
customer_reviews.author: Mona W. Banton

customer_reviews.title: Batteries are worthless
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these. Fun for literally 7 minutes. I followed directions exactly, charged both fully before use, and both lasted no more than 8 minutes before the batteries were dead. This includes my 115 pound wife. I weigh 180 and mine lasted about 1 minute longer. These are supposed to be able to handle a 220 pound person. Sending both back right now, thankfully I have all the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: They believe in customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: In the beginnin,g we got the wrong model. After contacting them they made it right and I cannot thank them enough for sending me the seat and stand that were missing. My son just loves his scooter.
customer_reviews.author: Gwynevere Reichelderfer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the seat and the option to remove the seat and stand. It goes faster than I expected but the throttle is either all or nothing. I just release the throttle and coast when I can. The break is good but slow down before pressing the break because it locks suddenly. I have had 3 people ask me where I got it. I highly recommend this scooter and am thinking of buying a couple more as Christmas gifts
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Dead after only 7 months!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is already dead...after only 7 months!!!! My kids just received these last Dec (Christmas) and hardly ever ride them. When they do, it's on flat streets going to a beibor's house. I bought 2 and 1 is already dead. What can I do to get this covered under warranty?
customer_reviews.author: Scott Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the entire family.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for his 8th birthday. He loves it! I thought it would be tough for him to ride, but not at all. He was comfortable riding it within a few minutes. In fact we all have had a chance to play (My husband, 15 yo daughter, and myself). It is so much fun to ride!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Tutty

customer_reviews.title: Has potential, needs quality control addressed.  Chain tensioner broke in 4 days.
customer_reviews.text: Solid frame construction, but Razor needs to work on this product. Four days into ownership, the chain tensioner spring has broken and rendered it useless until I can get new parts. This appears to be a common problem that has not been addressed by Razor's Quality Control department.
customer_reviews.author: K. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: The drive is not smooth and the seat is uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: this is to be a replacement for my Currie E500 which I passed on to my grandson, the E300S is in no way a reasonable replacement for the E550, the drive is touchy and the seat is not as comfortable. I can not say I am happy with it, but I will have to live with it. I'm sorry to report my disappointment but this is the case.
customer_reviews.author: Frank R. Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: works fine.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Seems to work fine. Took FOREVER to recieve it though. But again it does work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: What a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby has foot issues and can't walk long distances with a cane, but isn't disabled enough for a wheelchair either. This lets him scoot around the neighborhood or on vacation. Wish I had ordered one with a basket so he could ride it around the corner to the market, or could find an post-purchase accessory basket now. Evenso, battery last long enough and it's sturdy enough to get him around.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Starke

customer_reviews.title: We love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant as it was for my sons who is 9 but he’s a small 9. He was zipping around on this thing in no time. He has decided so far to go without the seat but we did measure it and he will be tall enough. My husband and I have also ridden around. This thing is fast! Great purchase we all love it!
customer_reviews.author: BrandyM

customer_reviews.title: What a nice ride!
customer_reviews.text: I love my scooter! I had to walk 1 mile from the parking lot at work with rheumatoid arthritis. This has saved me. Very sturdy, great for adults, and it really cruises!😅
customer_reviews.author: Janer

customer_reviews.title: I would have given it 5 stars if the throttle ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars if the throttle switch wasn't an off and on switch. Just to be clear, the switch can't be throttled to half speed. It's either full speed or off. If you want to go less than full speed, you have to either constantly turn the throttle off and or, or throw out an anchor.
customer_reviews.author: Jorg

customer_reviews.title: Of course this rocks.
customer_reviews.text: 15mph is FAST! And the motor is strong. It drove my husband (240lbs) down the block and back, a little slower than the other scooter we have, but it did it! (The weight limit says 150 and of course my husband had to try it anyway.) Got my kids new helmets and they LOVE THESE! I bought some of those little push on LED lights and attacked with 2 sided foam tape. Now my kids can go at night at be seen, too. Nothing beats a bicycle, but this is a different level of fun for sure.
customer_reviews.author: LynnB

customer_reviews.title: GUILTY AND PRICE
customer_reviews.text: IT CAME EARLY THAT,S GREAT, EASY TO ASSEMBLE. TIRES READY , FULLY CHARGE BIG PLUS. HAVE NOT RIDDEN YET BUT I DO NOT EXPECT ANY PROBLEMS. WOULD MOST DIFFERENTLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: EARL T.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for our 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: Our 10 year old loves it! It's powerful enough to carry a 200 lbs. adult around easily and it's very sturdy. No real complaints at all. I did have to change an inter tube within a couple weeks of giving it to our daughter, but I think that's more due to the fact that she was playing Evel Knievel with the curbs around our house! And FYI you can order the inter tubes easily on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: C_C

customer_reviews.title: I rides smoothly and is easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 11 year old son for Christmas and he loves it (so do I). I took my husband a little time to put together but was not difficult. I rides smoothly and is easy to maneuver. Taking off the seat is tricky the first couple of times but after that, it easy. The battery will last about 40 minutes and just wish it was bit longer. Be sure to have your little one use a helmet because it can go pretty fast!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Under powered
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get between classes at college, which are on separate hills, and even being handicapped I can get there faster on foot than on this. It's weight limit is stated at 220lb, but at 160lb I have to get off and push it up the hills. Even my 13yo son who weighs under 100lb can't get it to climb a reasonable hill. Another con is that the throttle only has 2 positions, full speed and off, not real good for safely crossing a plaza with pedestrian traffic.
customer_reviews.author: Customer, S.E. CT

customer_reviews.title: Over priced.  Fun to ride.
customer_reviews.text: Fun to ride. Will not go up much of an incline. Screws were stripped out for seat mounting. Had to buy new screws and re-tap the threads. (Metric) About 15 minutes of ride time. A little longer at slower speeds. Ok for a Chinese product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Rides like a dream
customer_reviews.text: I'm super happy with this. Got it yesterday, charged it, rode it this morning to work, 3.5 miles. Got used to it right away. It needed some foot pedaling on the last block going uphill (after 10 blocks of a medium uphill), but then worked well once it got to a flat street again. 15 miles an hour feels dreamy; I did side streets and bike lanes and got to work pretty fast. Bumps in the road were smoother than on a bike, which surprised me. I love not having to find a parking spot and not having to put any effort in.
customer_reviews.author: A Linsker

customer_reviews.title: don't buy this, it's crap
customer_reviews.text: box showed up with parts hanging out and all beat up, nothing fits correctly and in general it's poorly made, the chain comes off after 30 seconds of riding and has been a huge pain the butt to return now.
customer_reviews.author: reviews

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I am 73 years old and use this seated scooter to run around on my 10 acre property, saving me a lot of calories. I almost can't live without this little lightweight jewel. I wish I had it 10 years ago. It initially rode rough on my cattle grazed land and gravel driveway, but I put padding on the floor board and seat, so it rides reasonably softly now.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy looking
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 of these for my 3 daughters birthday party, seems to be a great product, plan to use these at campground. UPDATE after my 3 girls have used these in grass, mud, hills, waterholes, at every campground we have visited in the past almost two years, these have stood up awesome. Would recommend to anyone who has kids that love to ride around the campgrounds, and these are smaller than packing all the bikes
customer_reviews.author: melissa r.

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Condition Description
customer_reviews.text: Product Description was that it only had minor scratches, but that it was in good condition. Opened the box, and there was 1 of 2 screws missing and noticed a cracked rear fender in addition to visible dents and scratches. I like to keep, but only if price adjustment can be done. Pls advise.
customer_reviews.author: Vicente

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my 11 year old son. He ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11 year old son. He loves it. It is plenty powerful for him. We live on an incline so sometimes he has to push of with his foot to get it started. The description says the E300s comes with a 300 watt motor but mine shows a 250w motor (model: MY1016). I'm still looking into whether amazons description is wrong or if I somehow ended up with a smaller motor. Driving next to him, he is going a little over 15 mph, so I am inclined to believe the description is wrong. I will post an update when I find out.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Westlake

customer_reviews.title: This scooter is excellent. Compared to larger scooters it's much more lightweight ...
customer_reviews.text: This scooter is excellent. Compared to larger scooters it's much more lightweight and easy to work with. The seat is incredibly compact and sturdy. This scooter is also relatively quiet. The tires are thick and pneumatic and really handle bumps on the road very well. The brakes also work really well. Generally speaking, I feel really safe on this scooter.
customer_reviews.author: IA Electric

customer_reviews.title: Has anyone seen my husband?
customer_reviews.text: Husband purchased a new toy, thought we needed to further support the financial success of Amazon. Fun for all ages! Live a little. Get the scooter! Don’t forget your helmet!
customer_reviews.author: Za

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It is an AMAZING scooter and goes pretty fast! The only reason I am giving this 4 stars is because about 3 months in I bumped, no, "touched" it and the on/off switch came off so I had to pay somebody to repair it. About a month after that It broke down about a block from my house, and I had not been riding It for long do I had to trudge home in the heat... Other than that I'd been working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good scooter, mods make better
customer_reviews.text: Having a blast with this thing. Unfortunately, a few simple changes would lead to a higher rating from me, but many third-party mods are available. I just invested in a variable throttle and controller, which has been here great. Upgrading the battery soon as well. Stock scooter is good, but I think this shines if you're willing to put a little extra effort in.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Spano

customer_reviews.title: Seat is removable. No hole if you remove it.
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned than there would be a hole in the scooter base if I removed the seat, but that is not the case. The seat has a metal plate welded to it which bolts straight down to the scooter. Easily removable and you can't even tell there was suppsoed to be a seat. I have another e300, in blue, and it is slightly different. My other E300 has a quick release for the handle bars so it can collapse. This one doesn't. My other one has shocks in the front too, (they might be fake, I dont know), but this one doesnt. I love the slate blue gray color of this one.
customer_reviews.author: The Deckers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome electric scooter. Plenty of power but lacks speed depending on the weight of the rider. Used this side by side a Glion electric scooter and this one is loud because of the motor setup. Planning to upgrade this with a hub motor to make it quieter and more efficient.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dmac

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together...
customer_reviews.text: Great scooter, seems like it is sturdy and will be fun. Just have to teach my child how to ride now. Haven't taken it outside yet.
customer_reviews.author: JediJill

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Battery does not last at all. I thought I was buying a new but damaged unit. The packaging when it arrived at my home was completely shredded apart. The scooter was in good shape with only damage for a fender. But when I tried to use it the battery only lasted for 3 minute ride. I will never buy slightly damaged item from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, fun to ride
customer_reviews.text: Love this scooter and so did all those who were thinking of purchasing one that I let try it out 😎. It doesn't handle inclines very well but it makes it-slow & steady.
customer_reviews.author: De Bramhall

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It's great I love mine but for God's sake buy the kind where the steering stem folds down. I wish the seat folded down to.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hagge

customer_reviews.title: Used With Hurt Foot on Vacation- Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: We bought this so I could travel around the beach on vacation when I was in a boot cast. It's fast and works great. I would do 5 stars but it is a bit torquey but that is how electric motors are.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed! It is heavy and bulky for travel but definitely durable. I’m having slight issues with the handlebars not lining up or staying in alignment after a significant bump but I’m hoping it’s just a tightening matter.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: I am loving this!
customer_reviews.text: A great scooter for me. I am surprised at how much I really like it! I am tall and it suits me fine as well as being a swift ride!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: It has been great!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that could be better would be the on-off switch on the handle bar.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great just heavy
customer_reviews.text: Worked great but it's very heavy. Ran smooth goes fast fast. Got it up to 13mph. Tires were great on roadways cracks bumps. Enough power to go up hills. The only downfall to it is its weight.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I paid for extra fast delivery which was great but someone should have pulled this item and sold ...
customer_reviews.text: Although the box was dry at time of delievery, it iobviously was soaked at one time. The item has signs of being wet also. I am very concerned that the realiablity is questionable espically the electical componets show corrosion on the motor. This is for a birthday present for saturday so there is no time for exchange. I paid for extra fast delivery which was great but someone should have pulled this item and sold as damaged .
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Motor is pretty weak
customer_reviews.text: Several other reviews here mention this, but I am just disappointed with how weak the motor is. It works well on flat ground, and is comfortable to ride. But living in an area with hills, this is not a great choice. It barely putts up the slightest hill. :/
customer_reviews.author: DJanss

customer_reviews.title: Great for Full Time RVers....
customer_reviews.text: I full time RV, and bought this scooter to get around the park. Was easy to put together, charged it, and off I went. Bought small front and rear lights. No problems, needs a little push to get going, however when it does, it actually goes 15 mph. No regrets. I keep it inside when not riding, due to high theft item. Also, I don't want it out in the elements. I will probably purchase another one for my spouse.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Giovo Sr

customer_reviews.title: 5 miles range
customer_reviews.text: Goes about 5 miles on a full charge. Mostly level city bike trails. At the end of the 5 miles, I had to kick off with my foot the last couple hundred feet. I'm 175 pounds. It's what you can expect for $230.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg Lankin

customer_reviews.title: Good scooter for a teen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scooter after my daughter’s first one would no longer hold a charge. This one goes much faster than her original and does fine carrying an adult as well.
customer_reviews.author: SCMMama

customer_reviews.title: Amazon had the best price and it works very well
customer_reviews.text: A little worried because I could not find a warranty for it at all!! There were no papers in the box so that makes me uncomfortable when I spent so much for it... Amazon had the best price and it works very well. My Grand Daughter loves it, she is 11 years old. Now my 15 year old Grand Son wants one. It is heavy duty so an adult can ride it. We Love It.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie Ivey

customer_reviews.title: fun alternative to more expensive versions
customer_reviews.text: Got these on sale for Christmas for an amazing price for my 8 and 11 year old children (only 140.00 each). It is a bit difficult for my 8 year old to ride because her feet can't touch the ground yet when the seat is on. They both had a blast riding them. The only complaint is that the charge takes a long time and then it only lasts a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Rides great but only things it’s really loud for an electric scooter
customer_reviews.author: Denielle Rogers

customer_reviews.title: We have taken excellent care, and still ended up with only a ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased four of these in December. One has had a strange noise in the engine since we opened the box and a second scooter failed totally in June. They were used very little, and not at all really until spring time. We have taken excellent care, and still ended up with only a fifty percent success rate. Given the price point of these scooters, I would suggest avoiding them given our experience. The positive is that when they did/do work they are great fun for kids and adults alike, but their reliability is very poor. It would be nice if they had a smart charge, especially since the manual says they are only good for two hundred charges.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette C. Koppy, EA

customer_reviews.title: got this for the wife
customer_reviews.text: The wife has hip problems. Works great. The battery is good for about 30 or 40 minutes of non stop riding.
customer_reviews.author: DL Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  GREAT support!
customer_reviews.text: This company is awesome for support. Had this scooter for 6 weeks. Had a problem with it charging and they sent me a new replacement immediately. Scooter is fine for level and slight inclines. Kids LOVE it. It's good to see a company who supports their product so well. Would definately buy again from them.
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Three of us women put this together in a parking lot, and then the one with a medical boot rode it for an hour. It's versatile, in that you can use it with/without the seat. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: happycat

customer_reviews.title: It's nice, I like the seat
customer_reviews.text: It's nice, I like the seat, decent power. The only bad thing, but it's really bad, is there is no way to have a steady speed that is not maxed out at full speed. Their gas control either is full blast, or not on, nothing in between. I had to keep doing gas on, gas off, gas on, gas off, but the fact that is slowed down with no gas VERY quickly, it was a real pain. I thought more about trying to keep my speed and not go to fast instead of enjoying the ride.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor C.

customer_reviews.title: Bought For A Means Of Transportation.
customer_reviews.text: This Razor E300S Seated Electric Scooter was purchased for my grandson as a means of short distance transportation, & although my grandson hasn't even had this Razor E300S Seated Electric Scooter for a month yet, but so far it is running fine for now. I hope it runs/lasts for a long time due to the price my husband & I had paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: NOT Li-Ion
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't go as far as they say. If you have the smallest elevation it will kill your battery. DO NOT buy if you live in places above 80F
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Magalhaes

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is a snap, took 2 minutes - just put handle rod into body and tighten. Its pretty big size, good for adults also. First charge lasted more than an hour. My 11-year old kid had fun.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for everyone. The only thing I'm having trouble with is the attachment that connects to the stem to inflate the rear tire. It's a little sketchy. I haven't gotten it to work yet. I'm hoping to come up with something before the tire really needs inflated... Hoping...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product. I wish the battery lasted longer and charged faster. I think it really is old style and heavy lead batteries, and we pay a rather hefty price for it, here... Also the little foldeable leg unscrews easily and wiggles, and is hard to screw back tight. It's also not very stable. But I must say the son loves it and I use it on occasion, and it's a pretty nice product to go around on.
customer_reviews.author: Davy B.

customer_reviews.title: Is it for kids  or is it for adults as well  you decide
customer_reviews.text: Actually a decently built unit, However not everyone want Zero to 15mph I had to convert it to a variable speed throttle unit which I would think you should put on the unit in tar first place when you built it Do this and the uncomfortable seat I changed that as well. It can be a decent adult scooter if you tried a little harder to think it through
customer_reviews.author: Maintenance Professional

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Scooter, your child and/or kids will love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Razor Scooter is great. Great qualities about it are its built tough and it is fast, not too fast but not too slow. Pluses, the scooter right out of the box is put together, only need to screw and tighten handle bars and only takes 5-10mins to fully assemble. Afterwards, Just plug up to charge overnight. Negatives-Super long charging and short 40 mins drivable. Also, Shipping and Handling really broke and busted box, plus had some scratches on scooter. Overall, I'ld say its pretty cool, and my son all he wants to do now is go out and ride it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Norman

customer_reviews.title: Dependable
customer_reviews.text: This is much heavier and a bit slower than the newer types of scooters, but we’ve had it for years and it is a workhorse.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A Royden

customer_reviews.title: He is 14 and a good sized kid and this thing holds up to him ...
customer_reviews.text: Son received for Christmas 2017. He is 14 and a good sized kid and this thing holds up to him great! It is pretty fast and seems to be built quite durably. I would not hesitate to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: DeerCreekMike

customer_reviews.title: Used Product
customer_reviews.text: This was a used scooter. I don't believe it was stated as used when I purchased it. It was somewhat difficult to assemble because of stripped screws were unable to remove to finish the assembly. After assembling and charging the battery, it still doesn't work. The scooter was full of scraps and scratches. Basically it is worthless as sold.
customer_reviews.author: James Pollier

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it but the chain has come off ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it but the chain has come off twice due to the spring on chain tensioner breaking. You can't buy that particular part thru Razor so I have to purchase from a seperate company. It's a headache to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Oyler

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two - Neither worked
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two during Black Friday week as Christmas gifts for my boys aged 8 & 10. Both scooters arrived non-functional. I contacted Amazon and they immediately sent me one that was new and works great. I rebuilt one functional scooter out of the first two and now both boys are happy. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: HowzitUSA

customer_reviews.title: Review for Razor E300S Seated Electric Scooter
customer_reviews.text: This scooter was very well made and worth the price I paid. It was ordered for an elderly gentleman, and he loved it. The one thing he felt it lacked for him was foot rests near the front end, since it was uncomfortable for him to bend back his legs to rest on the platform. He had a metal fabricator add the foot rests he needed and it has made all the difference for him. Thank you for a superior product and great service!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Buy with confidence
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to install and uninstall the seat. It is super fast. Battery lasts for about an hour depending on the use.
customer_reviews.author: Rafik G.

customer_reviews.title: great for bigger kids!
customer_reviews.text: this is awesome, my son LOVES it! he is a bigger kid and it works perfect. he is 5'
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee G Horsley

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this thing. Best Christmas gift I have every purchased for her. She is 9.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Blank-Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for KIDS, BUT use your imagination and Great for MOBILITY ACCESS VEHICLE
customer_reviews.text: Able to modify it (voiding warranty) to use as a less expensive Mobility Device for a handicapped person. For short term travel, and not joy riding like a youth , battery lasted 20 days. LOVE IT.. definately better than a "MOBILITY" Scooter that charge 2 to 3thousand.`
customer_reviews.author: A.Fox

customer_reviews.title: Short Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son less than a month ago. It is sturdy and well built, but the battery life is very short. Within one month of use, it will not stay charged for longer than 10 minutes. Not sure if this is a defective battery or all of them are like this.
customer_reviews.author: Ann C lark

customer_reviews.title: Good Scooters
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Goes plenty fast enough for children. Been running 2 of these since December 25,2018. No issues
customer_reviews.author: jmk

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: The Scooter was scratched & looked used. The packaging was done unprofessionally & so bad . I had to return that.
customer_reviews.author: Payman T.

customer_reviews.title: My son bought this and loves it. Not quite ...
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this and loves it. Not quite as fast as he thought it would be, but it is fast enough. He rides it with and without the seat and truly enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave L.

customer_reviews.title: A very short battery use
customer_reviews.text: This scooter says it rides up to 40 minutes. I charged it fully when i first received it and tried it out and it shut off after 10 minutes of riding. I tried charging fully again but it ran out again in a very short amount of time. This is so expensive for a ten minute ride.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Scooter. Holds more weight then stated. We use it for at least an hour. The problem is thu the chain keeps coming off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No after sale support or care
customer_reviews.text: Product worked ok for about 6 months but after that th batery woulnd not last at all (max 1 mille) and the chain falls off all the time. Worse, I contacted the company asking for help about 1 month ago and never got an answer... not even a simple response... will never buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Alvarenga Bernardes

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great gift for my 13 year old grandson
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great gift for my 13 year old grandson... the batteries have to be charged every night... He lives on about 400 acres with few cars so he and his 10 year old brother, who has the E200S, have fun. I made the grandsons laugh when I rode the scooter....
customer_reviews.author: jitterbugjane

customer_reviews.title: Gets good speed going on the street
customer_reviews.text: This works well! My son really enjoys playing with his scooter and it seems to be well made and is working as expected. Gets good speed going on the street! I kid my wife about using this to go to work as she works about 1.5 miles from our house.
customer_reviews.author: Planoman

customer_reviews.title: I am a 29 year old female and I LOVE this. It's easy to drive and I don't ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a .7 mile commute, so I got this to save time spent during the day waiting on the bus. I am a 29 year old female and I LOVE this. It's easy to drive and I don't feel stupid at all on this. It's SO fun.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Easy to put seat on. My 14 year old uses it to get to school. It was our deal so he felt responsible for getting himself to school but had a fun way to do it. Charge lasts for more than an hour. Super fun and practical.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: Scooter was received with a flat tire and broken value stem. Purchased second scooter from Walmart unfortunately at a little higher price but no problem with scooter at all. Did not hear back from seller..
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: It rides only 10 minutes. I weight only 170 lbs
customer_reviews.text: Well, I ll be briefly. I weight 176 lbs., and the scooter says that it can ride for 40 minutes in continuos riding taking a person that weights up to 220 lbs. I tried for two days commute for 10 minutes, the scooter couldn’t finish the ride. it lasts only maximum 8 minutes greatly, moren than that it starts strugling. I will return it back for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Renato Roschel Ribeiro

customer_reviews.title: This is only good for very small kids
customer_reviews.text: This is only good for very small kids, there is not enough power to make this cool for bigger kids
customer_reviews.author: H.Stone

customer_reviews.title: I RECOMMEND IT BUT DOES NOT HAVE A LOT OF POWER AND BATTERY LIFE IS SHORTER THAN STATED
customer_reviews.text: THIS SCOOTER IS NICE AND STURDY HOWEVER THE BATTERY DOES NOT LAST THE 45 MINUTES AS STATED IN THE USER MANUAL AND IT DOES NOT HAVE ENOUGH POWER TO GO UP EVEN A BIT OF A HILL. WITH THAT SAID MY SON IS ENJOYING IT AND ONE THING - IT GOES REALLY FAST!!! FUN, FUN, FUN!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kipper

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice to have more fine grained controls on actuation like ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to be able to keep up with my Dad on his motorized scooter during our daily rides. Needs more torque to get up our steep hills, but does it's job handily on the flats and hills. Would be nice to have more fine grained controls on actuation like a soft start or ramp up of sorts. Hard to keep away from my tweeners.
customer_reviews.author: PaulsSon

customer_reviews.title: and it looked like muddy dirt on the fender underneath
customer_reviews.text: They shipped me a pink scooter that looked used. I bought a grey new scooter. But i recieved a pink one instead, that even seemed used due to rust on threads where the handlebar connects to the scooter. I flipped the scooter over on the rear tire, and it looked like muddy dirt on the fender underneath. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred W.

customer_reviews.title: These are fun to ride
customer_reviews.text: These are fun to ride. We bought two of them for our camping trips. Wish they had a quick disconnect for easier disassembly for travel.
customer_reviews.author: TSL

customer_reviews.title: smooth ride and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teen daughter to get back and forth to work. She loves it. smooth ride and easy to assemble. Other than the fact our first order was lost in the mail, which amazon took care for us we are very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Janet Welch

customer_reviews.title: Nice scooter but battery didn't last
customer_reviews.text: this scooter is nice and fun but the battery started to not hold a charge not to long after we got it. It's been a year now and it will only fun for a few minutes per charge. Kinda disappointed. Will have to buy battery.
customer_reviews.author: g man

customer_reviews.title: nice scooter.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it. He is 160 lbs and it works for a while. Doesn't last as long as when my younger, smaller grandson rides his. I guess it has something to do with the weight of the rider. But overall, nice scooter.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for adlults, too.
customer_reviews.text: I am an adult and use it to get around when camping. A great product at the right pricet. A bit sluggish going up hills, but you knew that already.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Petty

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my girlfriend and I and we both love them! They are awesome, easy to ride, not that loud and they go pretty fast. Thanks for making a great product. Rummage House
customer_reviews.author: Rummage House

customer_reviews.title: 11 year old son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: 11 year old loves it. So far the battery performs well. He did not care for the seat so we took it off. We should have bought the less expesive model without the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Gibson

customer_reviews.title: He loved it! I was worried about putting it together ...
customer_reviews.text: He loved it! I was worried about putting it together but it was SUPER easy. We did NOT put on the seat...he likes it without for now. I do wish the seat could come on and off easily so he could use it both ways but for now the seat is in our garage.
customer_reviews.author: WA mom

product_meta.title: Razor E300S Seated Electric Scooter - Matte Gray
product_meta.description: Built with a larger deck, frame and tires for teens and adult riders, the E300S is as comfortable as it is thrilling. The electric powered, chain-driven motor will have you cruising at up to 15 mph. Age: 13+.
feature_bullets: Boasting a high-torque, ultra-quiet chain-driven motor and a handy twist-grip throttle.Product Weight: 52 lbs,Max: 220lbs
Powered by a long lasting rechargeable 24V Seal battery system
Recharge time: Up to 12 hours, even if the light turns green. Recommended maximum charging time is 24 hours.
Run time: Up to 40 minutes of continuous ride time. Run time may vary depending on riding conditions, climate and/or proper maintenance.
Features rear wheel drive for increased traction and control
